languages.text: "Игры? Нет, время игр прошло". {n}Извечная насмешка гаснет в глазах друкари — он взирает на вас с пугающей серьезностью и... трепетом.{/n} "Только омытая кровью истина между теми, кто связан узами властвования".

"Games? No, the time for games is past." {n}The ever-present mockery evaporates from his eyes and he looks at you with frightening seriousness and... trepidation.{/n} "Only blood-soaked truth lies between those bound by domination."
languages.original_text: "Игры? Нет, время игр прошло". {n}Извечная насмешка гаснет в глазах друкари — он взирает на вас с пугающей серьезностью и... трепетом.{/n} "Только омытая кровью истина между теми, кто связан узами властвования".

traits.locale_text: "Games? No, the time for games is past." {n}The ever-present mockery evaporates from his eyes and he looks at you with frightening seriousness and... trepidation.{/n} "Only blood-soaked truth lies between those bound by domination."

"Games? No, the time for games is past." {n}The ever-present mockery evaporates from his eyes and he looks at you with frightening seriousness and... trepidation.{/n} "Only blood-soaked truth lies between those bound by domination."

"Games? No, the time for games is past." {n}The ever-present mockery evaporates from his eyes and he looks at you with frightening seriousness and... trepidation.{/n} "Only blood-soaked truth lies between those bound by domination."

"Games? No, the time for games is past." {n}The ever-present mockery evaporates from his eyes and he looks at you with frightening seriousness and... trepidation.{/n} "Only blood-soaked truth lies between those bound by domination."

languages.text: 「戯れだと？もうお遊びは終わりだ」{n}彼の目からは嘲笑が消え去り、恐ろしいほどの真剣さと…恐怖が伺えた。{/n}「支配に縛られた者たちの間には血塗られた真実しか残らない」
languages.original_text: "Games? No, the time for games is past." {n}The ever-present mockery evaporates from his eyes and he looks at you with frightening seriousness and... trepidation.{/n} "Only blood-soaked truth lies between those bound by domination."

traits.locale_text: 「戯れだと？もうお遊びは終わりだ」{n}彼の目からは嘲笑が消え去り、恐ろしいほどの真剣さと…恐怖が伺えた。{/n}「支配に縛られた者たちの間には血塗られた真実しか残らない」

languages.text: “游戏？不，游戏已经结束了。”{n}玛拉斋收起那副玩世不恭的表情，以极其严肃，而又……惶恐的表情盯着你。{/n}“在支配与被支配的双方之间，只有鲜血淋漓的真相。”
languages.original_text: "Games? No, the time for games is past." {n}The ever-present mockery evaporates from his eyes and he looks at you with frightening seriousness and... trepidation.{/n} "Only blood-soaked truth lies between those bound by domination."

traits.locale_text: “游戏？不，游戏已经结束了。”{n}玛拉斋收起那副玩世不恭的表情，以极其严肃，而又……惶恐的表情盯着你。{/n}“在支配与被支配的双方之间，只有鲜血淋漓的真相。”

languages.text: "Spiele? Nein, die Zeit für Spiele ist vorbei." {n}Der allgegenwärtige Spott verschwindet aus seinen Augen und er blickt dich mit furchterregender Ernsthaftigkeit und ... Beklommenheit.{/n} "Nur blutgetränkte Wahrheit liegt zwischen jenen, die durch Unterwerfung gefesselt sind."
languages.original_text: "Games? No, the time for games is past." {n}The ever-present mockery evaporates from his eyes and he looks at you with frightening seriousness and... trepidation.{/n} "Only blood-soaked truth lies between those bound by domination."

traits.locale_text: "Spiele? Nein, die Zeit für Spiele ist vorbei." {n}Der allgegenwärtige Spott verschwindet aus seinen Augen und er blickt dich mit furchterregender Ernsthaftigkeit und ... Beklommenheit.{/n} "Nur blutgetränkte Wahrheit liegt zwischen jenen, die durch Unterwerfung gefesselt sind."

languages.text: «¿Juegos? No, el tiempo de jugar ha terminado». {n}La omnipresente burla se esfuma de sus ojos y te mira con seriedad... y con inquietud.{/n} «Solo una verdad sangrienta yace entre quienes estamos unidos por el dominio».
languages.original_text: "Games? No, the time for games is past." {n}The ever-present mockery evaporates from his eyes and he looks at you with frightening seriousness and... trepidation.{/n} "Only blood-soaked truth lies between those bound by domination."

traits.locale_text: «¿Juegos? No, el tiempo de jugar ha terminado». {n}La omnipresente burla se esfuma de sus ojos y te mira con seriedad... y con inquietud.{/n} «Solo una verdad sangrienta yace entre quienes estamos unidos por el dominio».

languages.text: « Nos jeux ? Non, nous avons fini de jouer. » {n}L'habituelle moquerie de son regard s'évanouit et il vous observe avec un sérieux effrayant... teinté d'une indéniable inquiétude.{/n} « Seule une vérité ensanglantée existe entre ceux qui sont liés par la volonté de dominer. »
languages.original_text: "Games? No, the time for games is past." {n}The ever-present mockery evaporates from his eyes and he looks at you with frightening seriousness and... trepidation.{/n} "Only blood-soaked truth lies between those bound by domination."

traits.locale_text: « Nos jeux ? Non, nous avons fini de jouer. » {n}L'habituelle moquerie de son regard s'évanouit et il vous observe avec un sérieux effrayant... teinté d'une indéniable inquiétude.{/n} « Seule une vérité ensanglantée existe entre ceux qui sont liés par la volonté de dominer. »

languages.text: "Oyun mu? Hayır, oyunlar geçmişte kaldı." {n}Gözlerinde her daim mevcut olan alaycılık uçup gidiyor, sana korkutucu bir ciddiyetle ve... Endişeyle bakıyor.{/n} "Egemenlik ve biat ilişkisiyle birbirlerine bağlananlar arasında yalnızca kana bulanmış bir gerçeklik bulunur."
languages.original_text: "Games? No, the time for games is past." {n}The ever-present mockery evaporates from his eyes and he looks at you with frightening seriousness and... trepidation.{/n} "Only blood-soaked truth lies between those bound by domination."
